successes.title: Fief - France 1429
successes.description: Fief is a game of dynastic ambition, where players assume the roles of nobles in the 15th century Kingdom of France.

Pledges.description:
Supporter - Thank you! 
We appreciate your interest in supporting our project with your donation. You will receive all updates and newsletter information on the project and will be able to comment and ask questions.
Retailer - If you are a brick and mortar store, please contact Academy Games directly to pre-order Fief and all stretch goals.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign. You will be able to choose English, German or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section for this project.

FRENCH : Un exemplaire de la version "augmentée" de FIEF incluant tous les bonus des paliers qui auront été atteints durant la campagne. Frais de port offerts pour la France.
Pour les pays francophones, merci de lire la section frais de port.

SPANISH: Una copia de 'Fief - France 1429' Edición en Español y todas las recompensas obtenidas durante la campaña. Envío gratuito para España. Para el resto de países por favor vea el apartado "shipping" para este proyecto.

Limited Designer's Copy: Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' that includes a limited edition Designer's Signature Decal and all of the stretch goals that are met during this campaign. You will be able to choose English, German or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please  check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

FRENCH : Un exemplaire de la version "augmentée" de FIEF en série limité signé par Philippe MOUCHEBEUF incluant tous les bonus des paliers qui auront été atteints durant la campagne. Frais de port offerts pour la France. Pour les pays francophones, merci de lire la section frais de port.

Limited Designer's Copy: Due to popular demand we have added 100 more advanced copies of Fief - France 1429 that include the limited edition Designer's Signature Decal and all of the stretch goals that are met during this campaign. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

FRENCH: Suite à plusieurs demandes répétées, nous avons décidé d'ajouter 100 exemplaires de la version augmentée de FIEF en série limitée signé par Philippe MOUCHEBEUF incluant tous les bonus des paliers qui auront été atteints durant la campagne. Frais de port offerts pour la France. Pour les pays francophones, merci de lire la section frais de port.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus a copy of '1775 - Rebellion', our newest game in the Birth of America series! You will be able to choose English, German or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey (foreign language editions of 1775 are limited). Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

2 advance copies of 'Fief - France 1429', 2 of all Fief stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus two limited edition Designer's Signature Decals. You will be able to choose English, German or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus a copy of our best selling game 'Freedom - The Underground Railroad'. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

FRENCH : Un exemplaire de la version "augmentée" de FIEF incluant tous les bonus des paliers qui auront été atteints durant la campagne + un exemplaire du Réveil de l'Ours. Frais de port offerts pour la France. Pour les pays francophones, merci de lire la section frais de port.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus a copy of Historical Game of the Year 'Conflict of Heroes - Awakening the Bear! 2nd Edition' and its 'Wrecks and Destruction' expansion. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus a copy of 'Freedom - The Underground Railroad', plus a copy of '1775 - Rebellion'. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

3 advance copies of 'Fief - France 1429', 3 of all Fief stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus 3 limited edition Designer's Signature Decals. You will be able to choose English, German or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.

Your own advance copy of 'Fief - France 1429' and all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign, plus a copy of 'Freedom - The Underground Railroad', plus a copy of '1775 - Rebellion', plus a copy of '1812 - The Invasion of Canada'. Includes free shipping within the USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section of the project description.
